CatalogRecord.title: Catalog Record
CatalogRecord.description: A record in a data catalog, describing a single dataset.

state.title: state
state.description: Publishing state (published / draft) of the dataset.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: Internal identifier of the record. Required by API write operations.

contract.title: Contract
contract.description: Contract identifier or embedded contract object

metadata_owner_org.title: Metadata owner organization
metadata_owner_org.description: HAKA id of the organization who currently owns the organization. Can be modifier

metadata_provider_org.title: Metadata provider organization
metadata_provider_org.description: HAKA id of the organization who provided the metadata. Can't be modified after creation.

metadata_provider_user.title: Metadata provider user
metadata_provider_user.description: HAKA id of the user who provided the metadata. Can't be modified after creation.

research_dataset.title: Primary topic
research_dataset.description: Dataset described by this metadata record. Detailed in http://iow.csc.fi/model/mrd/ResearchDataset/

alternate_record_set.title: Alternate Records
alternate_record_set.description: List of records who share the same preferred_identifier value, but are saved in different data catalogs. The list of contains the identifier values of those records.

preservation_state.title: Preservation state
preservation_state.description: Allowed values: 0 = Initialized, 10 = Proposed for digital preservation, 20 = Technical metadata generated, 30 = Technical metadata generation failed, 40 = Invalid metadata, 50 = Metadata validation failed, 60 = Validated metadata updated, 70 = Valid metadata, 75 = Metadata confirmed,80 = Accepted to digital preservation, 90 = in packaging service, 100 = Packaging failed, 110 = SIP sent to ingestion in digital preservation service, 120 = in digital preservation, 130 = Rejected in digital preservation service, 140 = in dissemination.

preservation_description.title: Preservation system description
preservation_description.description: Preservation status described for the user

preservation_reason_description.title: Preservation reason description
preservation_reason_description.description: Reason for the preservation from the user

preservation_state_modified.title: Preservation state modified
preservation_state_modified.description: Date when preservation state was last changed

dataset_group_edit.title: Dataset group edit
dataset_group_edit.description: Group allowed to edit this record

dataset_version_set.title: Dataset version set
dataset_version_set.description: Information about the different related dataset versions.

preservation_dataset_version.title: Copy of this dataset in PAS
preservation_dataset_version.description: Copy of this dataset in PAS.

preservation_dataset_origin_version.title: Dataset where PAS dataset originates from
preservation_dataset_origin_version.description: Dataset where PAS dataset originates from.

new_version_created.title: New version created
new_version_created.description: Included in the API response when an update results in a new version being created.

date_modified.title: Date Modified
date_modified.description: Date on which the resource was changed.

user_modified.title: Modified by user id
user_modified.description: User id of the person who last edited this record

date_created.title: Date Created
date_created.description: Date of creation of the resource. Can't be updated once set.

user_created.title: Created by user id
user_created.description: User id of the person who created this record. Can't be updated once set.

service_created.description: Service name who created this resource.

service_modified.description: Service name who last modified this resource.

date_removed.title: Date removed
date_removed.description: Date of removal of the resource. Can't be updated once set

deprecated.title: Catalog record deprecation state
deprecated.description: If physical files that are part of the catalog record are unfrozen, deprecated becomes true

date_deprecated.title: Date deprecated
date_deprecated.description: Date of deprecation of the resource. Can't be updated once set

CatalogRecordVersion.title: CatalogRecord Version
CatalogRecordVersion.description: Information about various versions of a CatalogRecord.

id.title: id
id.description: Internal primary key of the record

preferred_identifier.title: Preferred identifier
preferred_identifier.description: preferred_identifier of the new dataset version.

CatalogRecordVersionCreatedInfo.title: CatalogRecord Version Created Info
CatalogRecordVersionCreatedInfo.description: A notification field returned from the API when a new dataset version has been created as the result of an update.

id.title: id
id.description: Internal primary key of the record

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: Identifier of the new version record

preferred_identifier.title: Preferred identifier
preferred_identifier.description: preferred_identifier of the new version record. Only preset for new dataset version records.

version_type.title: Version type
version_type.description: Type of the new version created.
